<a id="PopupPanel"></a>

# PopupPanel

**Inherits:** [Popup](Popup.md) **\<** [Window](Window.md) **\<** [Viewport](Viewport.md) **\<** [Node](Node.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

A popup with a panel background.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

A popup with a configurable panel background. Any child controls added to this node will be stretched to fit the panel's size (similar to how [PanelContainer](PanelContainer.md) works). If you are making windows, see [Window](Window.md).

<!-- classref-reftable-group -->

    </tr>
